column5: The americans sure like their sports. Here's a new one, which also happens to be a good approach to the asian carp problem they're having "down south"...      Enjoy! p.-
Coming soon to a lake near you   Watch out for "friendly fire" and "collateral damage" They seem to be good at that

Steady on Neil not everyones on the same sarcasm level as you and I matey. Some American states you can shoot carp with guns out side the city limit or summat like that or you could try Afganistan style fishing  http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=kg4bcaIXKHU  Regards Clive
Isn't bow fishing illegal in Canada? I kinda find it cruel..especially if you release it back into the waters..but I guess it's OK down south since carps are invasive species.
interesting for sure.  i rather fish the oldfashion way myself.  cheers!
WOW!!!!!!!!! that looks like alot of fun,where can i sign up for that,they should make killing them mandatory...lol..lol... great video,thanks for sharing that    cheers

thats a neat video.  The number of those carp flying through the air in some scenes is pretty scary.  I'd say shotgun would do a better job, although the whole bow and arrow thing is a better challenge
